duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the team of Systems Engineering Managers and drive support to Systems Engineers (SE) in generating growth within Commercial Accounts.
Oversee technical pre-sales operations and achieve revenue generation, individual, team, and organizational quotas.
Interact with customers and partners at a senior level, providing valuable insight into industry trends, customer challenges, technical evolutions, and business changes.
Develop and own outcome-oriented Systems Engineering initiatives that drive pipeline and sales, and ensure effective account planning is executed across the teams.
Lead portfolio expansion initiatives and ensure that the teams develop deep ongoing relationships across their accounts to drive adoption and growth across the portfolio after the initial sale.
Report and make visible the successes and deficiencies of the initiatives within the area.
Operate effectively in a matrix manner with extended teams, such as Support, Finance, WW SE, HR, Product Management, and other relevant organizations.
Act as an escalation point for pre-sales and post-sales technical issues that arise in the territory.
Develop, mentor, manage, and support reporting sales engineers with technical and organizational leadership.
Manage successful evaluations and timely return of evaluation equipment.

education_certification.credential: A minimum combination of 8 years of first and/or second line, Systems Engineering management experience preferred. Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred).
